item.createaddition.copper_spool.tooltip: Criará uma ligação entre eles e devolver um _Carretel Vazio_.
item.createaddition.gold_spool.tooltip.a: Criará uma ligação entre eles e devolver um _Carretel Vazio_.
item.createaddition.festive_spool.toolti: Criará uma ligação entre eles e devolver um _Carretel Vazio_.
item.createaddition.spool.tooltip.action: Criará uma ligação entre eles e devolver um _Carretel Vazio_.
statusbar.createaddition.wire.connect_in: Entrada do conector de fio selecionada
statusbar.createaddition.wire.connect_ou: Saida do conector de fio selecionada
statusbar.createaddition.wire.obstructed: O trajeto do fio está obstruido
statusbar.createaddition.wire.count: O nó do fio está cheio
statusbar.createaddition.wire.no_connect: O fio não está conectado aqui
deprecated.block.createaddition.electric: Gera _SU_ a partir de _FE_ e tem uma _velocidade_ configurável. O consumo de energia se baseia na _RPM_ definido.
deprecated.block.createaddition.alternat: Gera _FE_ a partir de _SU_. A quantida de energia produzida é baseada na _RPM_.
block.createaddition.accumulator.tooltip: Provides _FE_ to _wires_ connected to the _connector_ marked with a upwards arrow.
Accepts _FE_ from _wires_ connected to the _connector_ marked with a downwards arrow.
block.createaddition.connector.tooltip.s: Connecta blocos compatíveis _Forge Energy_ com _fios_ para transferir _FE_.
block.createaddition.connector.tooltip.a: Enquanto segura um _Carretel de Cobre_ ou _Carretel de Ouro_ para criar uma _ligação de fios_ entre dois _Conectores_.
block.createaddition.connector.tooltip.c: Click Dir. com uma Chave Inglesa
block.createaddition.connector.tooltip.a: Para alterar entre os modos _Empurrar_, _Puxar_, _Passivo_, e _Nenhum_.
block.createaddition.connector_copper.to: Connecta blocos compatíveis Forge Energy com _fios_ para transferir _FE_.
Enquanto segura um _Carretel de Cobre_ para criar uma _ligação de fios_ entre dois _Conectores_.
block.createaddition.connector_gold.tool: Connecta blocos compatíveis Forge Energy com _fios_ para transferir _FE_.
Enquanto segura um _Carretel de Ouro_ para criar uma _ligação de fios_ entre dois _Conectores_.
block.createaddition.redstone_relay.tool: Permite passar _FE_ do _conector de entrada_ para o _conector de saída_ quando recebe um _sinal de redstone_.
Providencia _FE_ para _fios_ conectados ao _conector_ indicado com uma flecha para cima.
Aceita _FE_ de _fios_ conectados ao _conector_ indicado com uma flecha para baixo.
block.createaddition.digital_adapter.too: A _Computercraft Peripheral_ which allows computers to interface with _Display Boards_, _Speedometers_, _Stressometers_, _Rope Pulley_, _Hose Pulley_, _Mechanical Piston_, _Mechanical Bearing_, and _Rotational Speed Controllers_.
createaddition.command.cca_api.link: Click here to open API documentation
createaddition.ponder.electric_motor.hea: Generating Rotational Force using Electric Motors
createaddition.ponder.electric_motor.tex: Electric Motors are a compact and configurable source of Rotational Force
Scrolling on the back panel changes the RPM of the motor's rotational output
The Electric Motor requires a source of energy (FE)
The motor's energy consumption is determined by the set RPM
createaddition.ponder.alternator.header: Generating Electric energy using an Alternator
createaddition.ponder.alternator.text_1: The Alternator requires at least 32 RPM to operate
createaddition.ponder.alternator.text_2: It generates electric energy (FE) from rotational force
createaddition.ponder.alternator.text_3: Its energy production is determined by the input RPM
createaddition.ponder.rolling_mill.heade: Rolling metals into Rods and Wires
createaddition.ponder.rolling_mill.text_: The Rolling Mill uses rotational force to roll metals into Rods and Wires
To manually input items, drop Ingots or Plates on the top of the Mill
Right-click the Mill to manually retrieve the output items
createaddition.ponder.automated_rolling_: The Rolling Mill can be automated using a Belt and two Funnels
Using ComputerCraft to control an Electric Motor
The Electric Motor can be controlled using ComputerCraft
Get to the API documentation by issuing the command '/cca_api' in the chat
createaddition.ponder.tesla_coil.header: Using a Tesla Coil to charge Items
createaddition.ponder.tesla_coil.text_1: The Tesla Coil will charge Items below it
createaddition.ponder.tesla_coil.text_2: It will charge any Forge Energy Items and more!
createaddition.ponder.tesla_coil_hurt.te: The Tesla Coil is also able to inflict damage on nearby Players and Mobs
This can be activated with a Redstone signal
createaddition.ponder.liquid_blaze_burne: Giving the Blaze Burner a Straw
will allow it to accept liquid fuels by Buckets
createaddition.ponder.modular_accumulato: The Accumulator is a multi-block structure
It can store large amounts of electric energy
To improve mod compatibility, the Accumulator will actively push energy to blocks placed on the top and bottom faces.
createaddition.ponder.pei_transfer.text_: Accumulators on moving contraptions cannot connect to stationary connectors.
This component can interact with Accumulators without the need to stop the contraption.
Place a second one with a gap of 1 or 2 blocks inbetween
Whenever they pass by each other, they will engage in a connection
While engaged, the stationary interface will represent ALL Accumulators on the contraption
Energy can now be exchanged according to the Push/Pull configuration of the connector...
After no energy have been exchanged for a while, the contraption will continue on its way.
createaddition.ponder.pei_redstone.text_: Redstone power will prevent the stationary interface from engaging.
death.attack.barbed_wire.player: %1$s tried to cross barbed wire while fighting %2$s
death.attack.tesla_coil.player: %1$s received a lethal electric shock while fighting %2$s
